Once in Memory: Love at First Sight
introduction: Kong，一个M.4/8的学生，是一个长得好看又受欢迎的年轻人，和另一个教室的酷学生Film一见钟情。Film不是一个刚刚坠入爱河的年轻人，而是一个致力于爱的人...那么，Kong与Film调情会成功吗？Kong, a student in M.4/8, is a good-looking and popular young man who falls in love at first sight with Film, a cool student in another classroom. Film is not a young man who just falls in love but is a person who is committed to love... So, will Kong succeed in flirting with Film?
